duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and build hardware and software systems for large-scale computing infrastructure.
Collaborate on architectural innovations for semiconductor TPU roadmap.
Monitor industrial and academic trends in artificial intelligence.
Engage with system and application software engineers to ensure optimization of hardware/software stack.
Evaluate the power, performance, and cost of prospective architecture and subsystems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
